extendedInfo.description: Simply get in and go â no problem thanks to the first App from car2go. Find the nearest available car2go very easily and rent it straight-away with this App. Our map view shows you the distance and the route from your location to the available car2go. You can now experience a totally new kind of urban mobility!Overview of features:â¢	Direct access to all car2go cities worldwide via the mapâ¢	A clearly arranged display of every car2go through intelligent groupingâ¢	Simple three-touch reservationâ¢	Possibility to display the home area on the mapâ¢	Problems with a reserved car can now be reported through the Appâ¢	Show park spots on the mapâ¢	Improved ability to contact the car2go hotline and supportâ¢	Automatic guidance in the App to the nearest car2goâ¢	Display of every available car2go in map and list viewsâ¢	Locate your current position via GPS and direct zoom into the car2go available in the vicinityâ¢	Comprehensive information on the selected car2go such as location (street, town), distance, drive type, fuel level or charge level, condition of the car2go interior/exterior and car registration â¢	...and much more!Register online now at www.car2go.com, discover everything about car2go and off you go! If you have any questions, suggestions or problems regarding the App, please contact us at app@car2go.com.

reviews.title: Not working on S3
reviews.comment: The map works very accurate but when I want to reserv the car is not working ....I have waited for 5 min. to work but nothing ....I can not use the app. To bad !
reviews.author: Marius Pop

reviews.title: It is all right
reviews.comment: Very accurate with the location, but cant check my account and charges with this app
reviews.author: Willene Suen

reviews.title: Works well overalll
reviews.comment: Isn\'t always up to date with cars that have been reserved or made unavailable...
reviews.author: Drew Carpenter

reviews.title: Car2go
reviews.comment: Fantastic app for finding one of the smart cars
reviews.author: Jamie Bate

reviews.title: Quirky, but improving
reviews.comment: Has a somewhat unusual interface, but seems to be improving with time. Vastly better than the web interface, which is saying very little. They should get the mobile team to work on the horrible car dashboard consoles.
reviews.author: Harlan Harris

reviews.title: Handy addition to Car2Go service
reviews.comment: Great for finding available cars in the Car2Go network. Periodic re-authorization is a bit annoying, but I appreciate the added level of security that provides, so I put up with it. Love the new radar feature.
reviews.author: J Howard Boyd

reviews.title: Good but not perfect
reviews.comment: App does a great job showing you available cars nearby and allowing to reserve them, but does not allow you to see any of your account information.   Updates should include a log of recent trips, total cost of recent trips, and available free minutes. There should also be an in-app version of the \"How to Car2Go\" manual found in each car.   App would be 5 stars with those updates!
reviews.author: Sam Steele

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent service. Excellent app. Disruptive business plan.
reviews.author: Hugh MacLeod

reviews.comment: Great..so far I\'ve really enjoyed using the service.
reviews.author: Louis Clark

reviews.title: Unzuverl\303\244ssig
reviews.comment: Zeigt Fahrzeuge, die dann nicht da  oder bereits reserviert sind. Keine M\303\266glichkeit zum Aktualisieren. In 50% der F\303\244lle ist auf die App \303\274berhaupt kein Verlass. Probleme mit Pinch and Zoom. Wirkt insgesamt halbherzig und unfertig.
reviews.author: Christoph H\303\266ller

reviews.title: Love car to go.
reviews.comment: Great concept, easy to use service. Users need this app to find cars and book while on the go.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good.
reviews.comment: Stable, fast, and simple.  The rating prompt is annoying but this rating will solve that little pickle.
reviews.author: Vincent St Pierre

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: But can\'t shut up asking about being rated!!
reviews.author: Hadi Akharas

reviews.comment: Love the service but the app is only adequate
reviews.author: Steve Burt

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: Works like a charm.
reviews.author: Stefan Wolczko

reviews.title: Necessary but not liked.
reviews.comment: Does it matter since they\'re going bankrupt?
reviews.author: Melissa Acevedo

reviews.title: Glitching does not let me books car
reviews.comment: I have repeatedly tried to book a car only for the app to tell me I am unable to reserve it. Major inconvenience.
reviews.author: Sabina Beg

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I like the app and the reservations are easy to make but it doesn\'t explain much. I was stuck in the parking garage because I didn\'t know how to get out and the app doesn\'t have instructions.
reviews.author: Samantha O\'Neill

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very reliable
reviews.comment: Especially late at night after a visit with friends.
reviews.author: A Google User
